name: Mutant Mandrake: I am Root
description:
I... am root

Keyboard Controls:

  • Movement - A, S, Left Stick, Numpad
  • Root - E
  • Jump - W, Space

Xbox Controls:

  • Movement - Left Stick, Numpad
  • Root - A
  • Jump - B

PlayStation Controls:

  • Movement - Left Stick, Numpad
  • Root - X
  • Jump - O

Global Game Jam Entry: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/mutant-mandrake-i-am-root-0

Credits:

  • Antanites
